text: Exercise 7.2 Here is the definition of a list reverse function. (defun rev (x) (if (endp x) nil (app (rev (cdr x)) (list (car x))))) A “true list” is a binary tree whose right-most branch terminates in nil. True lists are recognized by the predicate defined as follows. (defun true-listp (x) (if (atom x) (equal x nil) (true-listp (cdr x)))) Prove
